description: Retrieves the metadata for the specified Challenge.

parameters.name: ChallengeArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the challenge.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the challenge.

nested_items.name: ConnectorArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the connector.

nested_items.name: CreatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time that the connector was created.

nested_items.name: UpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time that the connector was updated.
